query:
Quantum error correction advances in 2024 from top-tier peer-reviewed journals (Nature, Science, Physical Review)

Context: Comprehensive academic review of latest quantum error correction techniques
Goal: Collect minimum 5 peer-reviewed sources with full academic citations
Specific Requirements:
- Publications from Nature, Science, Physical Review journals
- Published in 2024 only
- Focused on quantum error correction techniques
- Full citation details (journal name, publication date, DOI)
- Exclude non-peer-reviewed sources (no preprints, blogs, news)

Success Criteria:
- Minimum 5 academic sources meeting all criteria
- Detailed analysis of error correction methodology
- Quantitative performance metrics preferred
